channel.title: How do i make a npc say im online ( pimpscape)
channel.description: i added him to autospawn.. what next?

item.title: How do i make a npc say im online ( pimpscape)
item.dc:creator: @noob12345678 noob12345678
item.description:
@noob12345678 wrote:

find npc.handler, search for the npc that says ____ is online/ offline
edit the name/words. then save.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a npc say im online ( pimpscape)

item.title: How do i make a npc say im online ( pimpscape)
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

then go into npc.hander, then search for the npc id then there should be sumthing like this

[code]if player name is online = “playername”
Then say “Playername is online”

if player name is offline = playername"
then say “playername is offline”[/code]

sumthing like that. you will find it

Read full topic
